channel.title: News on CIRCULODEMAJALIS
channel.description: Recent content in News on CIRCULODEMAJALIS

item.title: Canha Medieval Fair '26 will be present at BTL
Register now for the "Oficinas de Dança" (dance workshop)
item.description: Registration for the “Oficinas de Dança” dance workshop is now open!

item.title: Canha Medieval Fair 2026: Registration open for merchants
item.description: Registration is now open for merchants, artisans, craftsmen, and traders for the 2nd Edition of the Canha Medieval Fair 2026.

item.title: Arbor Day 2026
item.description: On the 20th of March we will celebrate Arbor Day!

item.title: Register now for the "Teatro Raíz de Canha" group!
item.description: Registration is now open for the “Teatro Raíz de Canha” group.

item.title: Christmas Market of Pegões
item.description: We would like to thank Associação Arte com Vida for the opportunity to participate in the Pegões Christmas Market, which took place on December 12, 13, and 14, 2025, at the Cruzamento de Pegões church sports center, where we showcased some of the work created during 2025 by the participants of our association.

item.title: Seminar "Migrações, Observar, Conhecer e Pensar os Territórios"
item.description:
Our association was invited to participate and provide information.

On December 10, the seminar “Migrations, Observing, Understanding, and Thinking About Territories” will be held at the Sociedade Recreativa do Cruzamento de Pegões. The event will begin at 9:30 a.m.

item.title: Looking for artists for Creativity Day 2025
item.description: With the theme “Despertares” (Awakenings), MAJALIS invites everyone (friends, associations, individuals) to participate with a creative work using mostly recycled materials (paper, newspaper, fabrics, lace, plastics, wood, cork, etc.) using any techniques you wish (collages, modeling, painting, etc.).

item.title: "Feira Medieval" submitted to "Turismo de Portugal"
item.description: We would like to thank Dr. Carla Salsinha, president of the regional tourism board of Lisbon, for her sensitivity in understanding our project, the first edition of the Feira Medieval de Canha (Canha Medieval Fair), and for agreeing to submit it to Turismo de Portugal.
